```{r}
wei_world <- read_excel("wei.xlsx", sheet = 11)
wei_world <- janitor::clean_names(wei_tidy)

  wei_world <- wei_world %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("20"),      
    names_to = "year",
    values_to = "value"
  ) %>%
    pivot_wider(
    names_from = World,
    values_from = value
  )
  
  ggplot(wei_world, aes(x = year, y = total_clean_energy_usd_billion_2024_mer)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.2, colour = "#1b9e77") +
  ggtitle("Total Investment in Clean Energy (2015â€“2025)") +
  ylab("USD billions (2024 prices)") +
  xlab("Year") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::comma_format()) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14, hjust = 0.5),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 10)
  )
